name: amdiaz
description: The bio-cli package is a command line interface tool that displays a brief summary of a developer

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.pub:minor: npm run build && npm version minor & npm publish
scripts.pub:major: npm run build && npm version major & npm publish
scripts.pub:patch: npm run build && npm version patch & npm publish
scripts.pub:preminor: npm run build && npm version preminor --preid=beta & npm publish
scripts.pub:premajor: npm run build && npm version premajor --preid=beta & npm publish
scripts.pub:prepatch: npm run build && npm version prepatch --preid=beta & npm publish

author: amdiaz (https://antoniomdm.dev/)
